Trigger.name: Login
Trigger.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
homedir = getMudletHomeDir()
dofile(homedir .. "/scripts/triggers/login_trigger.lua") loginTrigger(line)
if reloadBotScripts == nil then dofile(homedir .. "/scripts/reload_bot_scripts.lua") enableTimer("ReloadScripts") end

Trigger.name: End list players
Trigger.script:
-- This script now lives in scripts/triggers/end_list_players.lua -- After editing it type /reload code or restart the bot for your changes to be used.
endListPlayers(line)

Trigger.name: PVP Police
Trigger.script:
-- This script now lives in scripts/triggers/pvp.lua -- After editing it type /reload code or restart the bot for your changes to be used.
if string.find(line, "eliminated") then pvpPolice(line) end

Trigger.name: MatchAll
Trigger.script:
-- This script now lives in scripts/triggers/match_all.lua -- After editing it type /reload code or restart the bot for your changes to be used.
matchAll(line)

Trigger.name: InventorySlot
Trigger.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
if botDisabled then return end
if (string.find(line, "Chat:")) then -- do not process the line because Slot was mentioned in chat not output from doing si else readInventorySlot() end

Trigger.name: Player connected
Trigger.script:
-- This script now lives in scripts/triggers/player_connected.lua -- After editing it type /reload code or restart the bot for your changes to be used.
if botDisabled then return end
if string.find(line, "denied: Too many players on the server!") then playerDenied(line) end
if string.find(line, "Player connected") then playerConnected(line) end

regexCodeList.string: denied: Too many players on the server

Trigger.name: playerinfo
Trigger.script:
-- This script now lives in scripts/triggers/player_info.lua -- After editing it type /reload code or restart the bot for your changes to be used.
playerInfoTrigger(line)

Trigger.name: Player disconnected
Trigger.script:
-- This script now lives in scripts/triggers/player_disconnected.lua -- After editing it type /reload code or restart the bot for your changes to be used.
playerDisconnected(line)

Trigger.name: Inventory
Trigger.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
if botDisabled then return end
if not string.find(line, server.botsIP) then return end
invCheckID = string.sub(line, string.find(line, "si ") + 3, string.find(line, "by ") - 2) deleteLine()

Trigger.name: Spam
Trigger.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
deleteLine() ExceptionCount = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^.*(ubex|FAPGD|NullReferenceException|Block on position|->|lifetime=|\'gt|\'mem|\'lp|command \'si|STATS|Time|Token|Started thread|RequestTo|Adding|Removing|Created player|Allowing|Authenticating|Player set to online|OnPlayer|NET: Received package|Infinity|Exited|Couldn\'t send RPC|Disconnected player|Error in|Exception in|INF VOICE|'GameManager| at AllocsFixes.|Freeing).*$

Trigger.name: Open Reserved Slot
Trigger.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
--[[ local steamid steamid = string.sub(line, string.find(line, "from:") + 6) if (steamid == Smegz0r) or (steamid == Soylent) then display("opening reserved slot\n") send("sg ServerMaxPlayerCount " .. tonumber(server.ServerMaxPlayerCount) + 1) server.ServerMaxPlayerCount = server.ServerMaxPlayerCount + 1 end --]]

Trigger.name: Chat
Trigger.script:
--[[ Botman - A collection of scripts for managing 7 Days to Die servers Copyright (C) 2015 Matthew Dwyer This copyright applies to the Lua source code in this Mudlet profile. Email mdwyer@snap.net.nz URL http://botman.nz Source https://bitbucket.org/mhdwyer/botman --]]
if botDisabled then return end
if gmsg == nil then enableTimer("ReloadScripts") else gmsg(line) end

Trigger.name: le
Trigger.script:
-- 13. id=2647, [type=EntityZombie, name=zombieBoe, id=2647], pos=(-97.3, 128.0, 195.5), rot=(0.0, 2.3, 0.0), lifetime=float.Max, remleote=False, dead=False, health=200
local temp, zedID, zedX, zedY, zedZ, zedDead, loc
temp = string.split(line, ",")
if temp[13] == " dead=False" and not (string.find(temp[2], "Item") or string.find(temp[2], "Player")) then zedID = string.sub(temp[1], string.find(temp[1], "id=") + 3) zedX = string.sub(temp[5], string.find(temp[5], "pos") + 5) zedY = temp[6] zedZ = string.sub(temp[7], 1, string.len(temp[7]) - 1)
-- if distancexyz( players[Smegz0r].xPos, players[Smegz0r].yPos, players[Smegz0r].zPos, zedX, zedY, zedZ ) < 20 then -- send("kill " .. zedID) -- end
loc = inLocation(zedX, zedZ)
if locations[loc].killZombies then send("kill " .. zedID) end end
-- do some checks with where players and items are. want to detect item spawn cheaters if string.find(temp[2], "Item") or string.find(temp[2], "Player") then
end

Timer.name: ReloadScripts
Timer.script: --Mudlet can only successfully reload external Lua scripts if done from inside a timer. Since we only want it to run once each time, we disable the timer immediately after. dofile(homedir .. "/scripts/reload_bot_scripts.lua") reloadBotScripts() disableTimer("ReloadScripts")

Action.name: Show Players
Action.script:
clearUserWindow(server.windowPlayers) --clearUserWindow(server.windowLists) showPlayers = true
--for k, v in pairs(igplayers) do -- cecho(server.windowLists, k .. " " .. v.name .. " " .. v.id .. "\n") --end

Action.name: Show Tables
Action.script:
--display(serverFields) --display(playerFields)
--echo("Players table\n") --display( players ) --display( players["76561197983251951"] )
--echo("In-game Players table\n") --display( igplayers )
--echo("Admins table\n") --display( admins )
--echo("Friends table\n") --display( friends )
--echo("Teleports table\n") --display( teleports )
--echo("Locations table\n") --display( locations )
echo("Server table\n") display( server )
--echo("chatvars table\n") --display( chatvars )
--echo("Timed Commands table\n") --display( timedCommands )
--hotspots={} --echo("Hotspots table\n") --display( hotspots )
--echo("badItems table\n") --display( badItems )
--echo("playerQueuedCommands table\n") --display( playerQueuedCommands )
--echo("ArenaPlayers table\n") --display( arenaPlayers )
--echo("Inventory table\n") --display( inventory["76561197983251951"] ) --display( inventory ) --display( invTemp )
--echo("resetRegions table\n") --display( resetRegions )
--echo("gimmeQueuedCommands table\n") --display( gimmeQueuedCommands )
--echo("lastHotspots table\n") --display( lastHotspots )
--echo("Owners table\n") --display( owners )
--echo("Villagers table\n") --display( villagers )
--echo("restrictedItems table\n") --display( restrictedItems )
--stackLimits={} --display(stackLimits)
--echo("shop categories table\n") --display( shopCategories )
--echo("proxies table\n") --display( proxies )
--display(customCommands)

Script.name: FirstRun
Script.script:
-- This script is run first when the bot starts up
require "lfs"
homedir = getMudletHomeDir()
lfs.mkdir(homedir .. "/daily") lfs.mkdir(homedir .. "/dns") lfs.mkdir(homedir .. "/proxies") lfs.mkdir(homedir .. "/temp") lfs.mkdir(homedir .. "/scripts")
serverDataLoaded = false botDisabled = false dbConnected = false botOffline = 0
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", "downloadHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadError", "downloadHandler")
